statements: DELETE FROM regulatory_compliance_data WHERE company_name = 'ABC Inc.' AND compliance_status = 'Not Compliant';
DELETE FROM regulatory_compliance_data WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp' AND compliance_status = 'Not Compliant';
DELETE FROM risk_monitoring_data WHERE risks_detected = TRUE;
DELETE FROM regulatory_compliance_data WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp' AND regulation_type = 'Environment';
DELETE FROM risk_monitoring_data WHERE company_id = 'a4c8b43c-26f4-4b4d-8073-37f11192cfab' AND monitoring_date = '2022-07-15';
DELETE FROM compliance_data WHERE risk_level > 3 AND report_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM ComplianceRecords WHERE entity_id = 10 AND compliance_status = 'Pending';
